items.title: Cowork VM fails on Windows 11 Home: wrong DNS config, missing sessiondata.vhdx, no NAT
items.reply_draft:
I feel you â€” this kind of error is usually about permissions / install location / PATH / caches.
I summarized a step-by-step checklist (with common mistakes + fixes) here: https://mikann20041029.github.io/solve-multi-windows-powershell-execution-policy-202602221615/
If you can share OS + Node/npm versions and the exact command, it's easier to pinpoint.
